content.headline: Welcome to ITSA
content.subheadline: Empowering innovation through technology and collaboration. Join our community of forward-thinking professionals shaping the future.

announcements.title: Tech Summit 2025
announcements.text: Our Annual Tech Summit is scheduled for October 15th, 2025! Join industry leaders and tech enthusiasts.

announcements.title: Member Portal Launch
announcements.text: New member portal is now live! Access exclusive resources, networking tools, and event materials.
